title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS universal Mann ProVent 1/2″ Catch Can Kit for Crank Case 12mm (1/2″) Outlet (incl. Nissan Navara / Patrol 2.8L 3.0L ZD30) OS-PROV-09

content.rendered:
Universal Mann ProVent 12mm (1/2″) Oil Catch Can Kit suits:

ANY vehicle with 12mm (1/2) Crank Case Outlet

Including: Nissan Navara & Patrol 2.8L 3.0L

The Half Inch Installation Kit is generally to suit the Nissan Patrol’s & Navara’s with the 3.0L ZD30 engines or any other engine with a Half Inch or 12mm fitting out of the top of the crankcase. Kit Includes a ProVent unit and hoses clamps and fittings. Genuine MANN+HUMMEL ProVent unit from Germany. Will stop sludge from collecting in your air intake & intercoolers !

Flow Direction: The Crankcase air is to come from the ‘Outlet of the Crankcase’ to the ‘Top Inlet of the ProVent 200’ with the ‘ProVent’s Lower Outlet’ attached to the ‘Engine’s Air intake’.

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Download PDF Installation Instructions >

Fitting Instructions:

Firstly choose the position you wish to mount the ProVent 200 unit (there are alot of good information on various 4WD online forums).

(1) Work out where you are going to mount the ProVent in the Engine Bay.

(2) Slide the Silicone Reducers on to the inlet & outlet ports of the ProVent Unit.

(3) Decide whether to use the straight or elbow joiners to suit where in the engine the unit is to be fitted.

(4) Cut the 12mm hose to suit length required & slider onto joiners.

Fitting Drain Kit (included): Cut the clear hose to the desired length. Attach to lower outlet of the ProVent unit & secure with clamp provided. (Ensure Drain Cock is in closed position and drain periodically.

Servicing: The ProVent 200 element will need replacing between 30-40k kms or when oil starts to seep from the top cap & the ProVent body.
